==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=玛瑙}}

===Etymology===
From earlier {{zh-l|*馬腦|tr=mǎnǎo|horse's brain}}, a literal translation of {{der|zh|sa|अश्मगर्भ||emerald [horse + kernel]}} (transcription: {{zh-l|*阿濕嚩揭波}}).

Compare {{cog|bo|རྟ་ཀླད||agate [horse + brain]}}, said to be a Chinese calque, which is later semantically regularised into {{m|bo|རྡོ་ཀླད||agate [stone + brain]}}.
